# admiralty-input-invalid

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                                                                                                     |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | The error content should be placed in the slot e.g. `<admiralty-input-invalid>This field is required</admiralty-input-invalid>` |
